möglich\n</div>\n</form>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<script>\n$(function() {\n  $(\".newsletter-menu-scroll-form\").validate({\n    rules: {\n      'subscription[email]': { required: true, email: true, jQuery.extend({\n      fadeSpeed: 200\n      }, settings);\n      var el = $(this);\n      return this.each(function() {\n        el.hide();\n        $(window).scroll(function() {\n          if(!dd.show_scrolling_newsletter_box) {\n            $('#floating-box').addClass('hidden');\n          }else{\n          var layerMargin = $('.two-column').height();\n           if($(window).scrollTop() >= layerMargin - 200) {\n               if($('.two-column').height() > $('.one-column').height()) {\n                 el.css('top','450px');\n                 el.fadeIn(settings.fadeSpeed);\n               }\n               return;\n           }\n          }\n          if($(window).scrollTop() <= $('.one-column').height() ) {\n            el.fadeOut(settings.fadeSpeed);\n          }\n  \n        });\n      });\n   };\n  \n  \n    $('#floating-box').topBox({\n      fadeSpeed: 500\n    });\n  \n    $('.close-box').click(function(){\n      $('#floating-box').addClass('hidden');\n      $.cookie('NLScroll', '1', {expires: 60*60*30*24, path: '/', secure: true});\n    });\n  });\n</script>\n\n</div>\n\n</div>\n</aside>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<footer id=\"footer\">\n<div class=\"container js-bottom-fixed fixed-margin-footer\" data-ga-track=\"stdPageTrack\" \n  if (true == true){\n    $('.jsCategorys').hide();\n  }\n  \n  $('.jsShowCitys').click(function(){\n    $('.jsCategorys').hide();\n  });\n  \n    // tracking Travelfilter //\n  var trackContainer = \"\";\n  var trackingVar;\n  \n  $(\".jsTravelFilterCategory\" ).each(function( index ) {\n  \n    if ($(this).is(\":checked\") ) {\n       trackingVar =  $(this).val();\n       trackContainer = trackContainer +' '+ trackingVar;\n      $('.filter-button').attr('rel',trackContainer);\n    };\n  \n  });\n  \n  \n  \n  $('.jsTravelFilterCategory').click(function() {\n    if ($(this).is(\":checked\") ) {\n      trackingVar =  $(this).val();\n      trackContainer = trackContainer +' '+ trackingVar;\n      $('.filter-button').attr('rel',trackContainer);\n    }\n $('.js-show-new').click(function() {\n    var pathUrl\n    pathUrl = $(this).attr('rel');\n    $('.set-city').html($(this).html());\n  });\n  \n  if (true != true){\n    $('.jsCitys').hide();\n  }\n  \n  if (true == true){\n    $('.jsCategorys').hide();\n  }\n  \n  $('.jsShowCitys').click(function(){\n    $('.jsCategorys').hide();\n  });\n  \n    // tracking Travelfilter //\n  var trackContainer = \"\";\n  var trackingVar;\n  \n  $(\".jsTravelFilterCategory\" ).each(function( index ) {\n  \n    if ($(this).is(\":checked\") ) {\n       trackingVar =  $(this).val();\n       trackContainer = trackContainer +' '+ trackingVar;\n      $('.filter-button').attr('rel',trackContainer);\n    };\n  \n  });\n  \n  \n  \n  $('.jsTravelFilterCategory').click(function() {\n    if ($(this).is(\":checked\") ) {\n      trackingVar =  $(this).val();\n      trackContainer = trackContainer +' '+ trackingVar;\n      $('.filter-button').attr('rel',trackContainer);\n    }\n  });\n</script>\n\n<div aria-hidden=\"true\" aria-labelledby=\"category-selector-label\" class=\"modal fade\" id=\"category-selector-big\" role=\"dialog\" tabindex=\"-1\">\n<div class=\"modal-dialog\">\n<div class=\"modal-content\">\n<div class=\"modal-header\">\n<button aria-hidden=\"true\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"modal\" style=\"width:20px\" type=\"button\">\n×\n</button>\n<h4 class=\"modal-title\" id=\"city-selector-label\" style=\"color:#333\">\nWähle eine Kategorie!\n</h4>\n</div>\n<div class=\"modal-body\">\n<div class=\"row\">\n<ul>\n<li class=\"margin-bottom-20\" style=\"color:#777;list-style:none;\">\n<a class=\"font-color-grey-999 font-size-16 passiv selector-subcategory\" data-ga-track=\"essen-trinken\" class=\"modal-footer\">\n<button class=\"btn btn-default\" data-dismiss=\"modal\" style=\"width:95px\" type=\"button\">\nAbbrechen\n</button>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<script>\n  $('.js-show-new').click(function() {\n    var pathUrl\n    pathUrl = $(this).attr('rel');\n    $('.set-city').html($(this).html());\n  });\n  \n  if (true != true){\n    $('.jsCitys').hide();\n  }\n  \n  if (true == true){\n    $('.jsCategorys').hide();\n  }\n  \n  $('.jsShowCitys').click(function(){\n    $('.jsCategorys').hide();\n  });\n  \n    // tracking Travelfilter //\n  var trackContainer = \"\";\n  var trackingVar;\n  \n  $(\".jsTravelFilterCategory\" ).each(function( index ) {\n  \n    if ($(this).is(\":checked\") ) {\n       trackingVar =  $(this).val();\n       trackContainer = trackContainer +' '+ trackingVar;\n      $('.filter-button').attr('rel',trackContainer);\n    };\n  \n  });\n  \n  \n  \n  $('.jsTravelFilterCategory').click(function() {\n    if ($(this).is(\":checked\") ) {\n      trackingVar =  $(this).val();\n      trackContainer = trackContainer +' '+ trackingVar;\n      $('.filter-button').attr('rel',trackContainer);\n    }\n  });\n</script>\n\n<div aria-hidden=\"true\" aria-labelledby=\"city-selector-label\" class=\"modal fade\" id=\"city-selector-big-xs\" role=\"dialog\" tabindex=\"-1\">\n<div class=\"modal-dialog\">\n<div class=\"modal-content city-cover-layer\">\n<div class=\"cover-city-layer\">\n<div class=\"cover-image\"></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"modal-header\" style=\"border:0\">\n<button aria-hidden=\"true\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"modal\" style=\"width:20px\" type=\"button\">\n×\n</button>\n<h4 class=\"modal-title\" id=\"city-selector-label\" style=\"color:#333\">\n<span>\nWähle Deine Kategorie!\n</span>\n</h4>\n</div>\n<div class=\"modal-body\" style=\"padding-top:0\">\n<div class=\"row font-size-14 margin-bottom-10\"
